news_header: Dover Corp reported a decrease in fourth-quarter earnings compared to last year.
news_text: Dover Corp (DOV) announced its fourth-quarter earnings, which fell to $238 million, or $1.72 per share, down from $258 million, or $1.84 per share, in the same period last year. Adjusted earnings, excluding items, were $305 million or $2.20 per share. Revenue increased by 1.3% to $1.930 billion from $1.905 billion last year.
